name: THE LIMINAL SPACE
description:
Liminal space exists when physical experience meets the internal dialogue. An ever evolving space for one to comprehend the present time and its embodiment in many forms. 

THE LIMINAL SPACE was one of the piece I created when a friend explored the way of experiencing pleasure. 

I began with wanting to visualise my interpretation of in-between-ness (liminal space) with ink drawing yet something about monochromatic photographs came across after having quite some-time to use camera and explore layers digitally. Then I decided to use photography as the medium.

For a moment during the process I chose the body of one of the closest people i knew to bring vulnerability to the front lens while extending it with the way his body interpreted and got used to physical and non-physical pleasure by himself.

We found out that liminal state of pleasure was something that quite took a toll on how he perceived and i perceived his presence and physical body. A subtle yet  evolving state of interpreting and embodying pleasure using body as medium which later captured in cold objectivity of lens.
